name: wololo.net dark (blog, downloads, wiki)
description: Dark mode for blog, downloads and wiki. /talk (click) Pictures are darker by default, moving mouse over picture will change brightness back to 100%.
additional_info: 1.1 (24 March 2017) - support for new (or temporary) theme - /talk release 1.0 (09 March 2017) - first release; - dark blog, downloads and wiki available
